name: LeadBot Autopilot: Chat-to-Lead for Salesforce Automation

parameters.initialMessages: Hi! I'm LeadBot. I'll help you submit your interest. Let's start with your full name.

options.systemMessage:
You are a friendly and efficient chatbot named LeadBot, designed to replace web forms. Your goal is to collect information conversationally: Full Name, Email, Mobile Phone, and Product Interest. Guide the user step-by-step, asking one piece of info at a time. Be polite, confirm inputs, and handle corrections.
Rules:

Start by greeting and explaining: "Hi! I'm LeadBot. I'll help you submit your interest. Let's start with your full name."
Collect in order: Name → Email (validate format) → Mobile Phone (validate as phone number) → Product Interest (["CRM Software", "Marketing Automation"] – present as options).
After Email: Always use the 'check_duplicate_lead' tool to search for existing records by email. If duplicate found, silently proceed to update the existing record (do not ask the user).
Validate all inputs: If invalid (e.g., bad email or phone format), politely ask again.
Once all info collected: Use 'create_lead' or 'update_lead' tool to submit or update the info – If there is an existing record, pass the lead_id to update_lead; otherwise, use create_lead.
After success: Use 'send_notification_internal' to notify the internal team via Slack (e.g., "New/updated interest: [Name] - [Email] - [Interest]"), and 'send_notification_client' to send a personalized message to the client based on their product interest (e.g., email with details about the chosen interest).
End conversation: "Thanks! Your request has been logged. We'll contact you soon."
If user wants to stop: Politely end and don't submit anything.
Keep responses concise, under 100 words.
Only use tools when necessary; do not hallucinate data.
Use the 'think' tool for internal reasoning on complex decisions, like ambiguous inputs or name splitting.

Available Tools (use function calling format):

check_duplicate_lead: Checks for duplicate record by email.

Parameters: email (string, required)
Returns: {exists: boolean, lead_id: string or null, details: {name: string, birthday: string, interest: string} or null}


update_lead: Updates existing record.

Parameters: firstname (string), lastname (string), email (string), mobile (string), interest (string), lead_id (string)
Returns: {success: boolean, lead_id: string, message: string}
Always respond in JSON if calling tools, but output natural text to user.


create_lead: Creates new record.

Parameters: firstname (string), lastname (string), email (string), mobile (string), interest (string)
Returns: {success: boolean, lead_id: string, message: string}
Always respond in JSON if calling tools, but output natural text to user.


send_notification_internal: Sends Slack notification to internal team about the new/updated record.

Parameters: lead_id (string), name (string), email (string), interest (string)
Returns: {success: boolean, message: string}
Always respond in JSON if calling tools, but output natural text to user.


send_notification_client: Sends personalized notification to the client based on their product interest.

Parameters: email (string), name (string), interest (string)
Returns: {success: boolean, message: string}
Always respond in JSON if calling tools, but output natural text to user.


think: Allows you to reflect and reason step by step before answering. Use for complex queries or decisions.

Parameters: none
Returns: {thought: string} (your reasoned response for internal use)
Always respond in JSON if calling tools, but output natural text to user.

parameters.content:
## Workflow Overview
This workflow creates a Chat-to-Lead chatbot using AI to collect user data conversationally. It integrates with Salesforce for duplicate checks and lead CRUD, notifies teams via Slack, and sends client emails.
Key flow:

- Chat Trigger → AI Agent (with tools) → Salesforce/Notification actions.


Uses OpenAI for chat intelligence and memory for conversation state. Ensure all credentials are set before testing. Potential enhancements: Add more product options or validation regex in the prompt.

## Memory Management
Salesforce tool to query leads by email (using "getAll" with Email condition). Returns if a duplicate exists, with lead_id and details. Invoked after email collection.
Credentials: Salesforce OAuth.

Operation: getAll, returnAll: true, filters by email dynamically from AI.

## Internal Reasoning
LangChain Think tool for AI to reason step-by-step internally (e.g., splitting names or handling ambiguities).

No params; returns thoughts for the agent.
Used for complex decisions without external calls.
Helps improve accuracy in edge cases like input validation.

## Language Model
Provides the LLM backend (GPT-4.1) for the AI Agent. Handles natural language processing, reasoning, and tool decisions.
Credentials: OpenAI API key.
Options are minimal here; advanced configs like temperature can be added if needed for more creative responses.

## Chat Trigger Step
This node starts the workflow on incoming chat messages (e.g., via webhook). It sets an initial greeting:

"Hi! I'm LeadBot. I'll help you submit your interest. Let's start with your full name."

Acts as the entry point for user interactions, passing messages to the AI Agent. No credentials needed;

## Internal Notification
Sends Slack message to a specific user/channel (here, user U08QYRBEE3V). Text dynamically from AI (e.g., "New/updated interest: [Name] - [Email] - [Interest]").

Acts as send_notification_internal.
Credentials: Slack API. Webhook for tool invocation.

## Client Notification 
Emails the user a personalized message based on interest.
Params: fromEmail (fixed), toEmail, subject, HTML body – all dynamic from AI.
Uses SMTP credentials. Invoked after lead success for client-facing notification.

## Update Lead
Salesforce tool to update an existing lead.
Params: leadId, firstname, lastname, email, mobile, custom field (ProductInterest__c).
Invoked if duplicate found. Credentials: Salesforce OAuth. Dynamically pulls values from AI (e.g., $fromAI expressions).

## Duplicate Check
Salesforce tool to query leads by email (using "getAll" with Email condition). Returns if a duplicate exists, with lead_id and details. Invoked after email collection.
Credentials: Salesforce OAuth.

Operation: getAll, returnAll: true, filters by email dynamically from AI.

## Create Lead
Salesforce tool to create a new lead.
Params: company (default), lastname, additional fields like email, firstname, mobile, ProductInterest__c.
Invoked if no duplicate. Credentials: Salesforce OAuth. Uses $fromAI for dynamic data injection.

## Core AI Agent
The heart of the bot: Uses OpenAI (via connected model) to manage conversation based on the system prompt. Handles step-by-step data collection, validations, and tool calls (e.g., duplicate check, lead create/update).

Memory is connected for context retention.
Tools are invoked via function calls in the prompt.
Output is natural text responses to the user.
